nodes.label: Identify Structure Type
nodes.question: What type of structural element is being analyzed?

nodes.label: Identify Applied Loads
nodes.question: What loads act on the structure (dead, live, wind, seismic)?

nodes.label: Apply Load Combinations
nodes.question: Combine loads per code requirements (e.g., 1.5DL + 1.5LL per IS 456, or LRFD per AISC).

nodes.label: Verify Material Properties
nodes.question: Confirm material grade, yield strength, and allowable stress.

nodes.label: Analyze Section Capacity
nodes.question: Calculate moment, shear, and axial capacity of the section.

nodes.label: Compare Demand vs Capacity
nodes.question: Is the demand (applied loads) within the section capacity?

nodes.label: Check Serviceability (Deflection)
nodes.question: Is deflection within L/360 (or applicable code limit)?

nodes.label: Check Stability (Buckling)
nodes.question: Check for local/global buckling, lateral-torsional buckling.

nodes.label: Verify Connections
nodes.question: Are connections (welds, bolts, splices) adequately designed?

nodes.label: Design FAILS ⚠️ — Revise Section
nodes.question: Increase member size, add reinforcement, or change connection detail.
